description.value:
Attaches to the Shoulder or Backpack unit, provides all ranged weapons the user wields the benefits of a Red-Dot Laser Sight and Telescopic Sight as well as imposing -10 to Dodging Ranged Attacks made by the user.

Requirements

Red-Dot Laser Sight: +10 to Single Shot Ranged Attacks Telescopic Sight: Full Action Aiming ignores penalties for firing at Long or Extreme Ranges.

Effect: Distinguished

Notes: 25 R
description.summary: Attaches to the Shoulder or Backpack unit, provides all ranged weapons the user wields the benefits of a Red-Dot Laser Sight and Telescopic Sight as well as imposing -10 to Dodging Ranged Attacks made
